commit.message:
i386.c (ix86_va_arg): Call set_mem_alias_set.

	* config/i386/i386.c (ix86_va_arg): Call set_mem_alias_set.
	(ix86_setup_incoming_varargs): Likewise.

From-SVN: r45924

files.patch:

+	* config/i386/i386.c (ix86_va_arg): Call set_mem_alias_set.
+	(ix86_setup_incoming_varargs): Likewise.
